message.entry: detectSift expected its first input to be of uint8 type.
detectSift expected its second input to be a 1-by-1 structure.
파라미터 구조체의 필드 개수가 올바르지 않습니다.
ContrastThreshold field of points structure must be single class.
EdgeThreshold field of points structure must be single class.
NumLayersInOctave field of points structure must be int32 class.
Sigma field of points structure must be single class.
SIFT 특징에 대한 코드 생성은 지원되지 않습니다.
